item.title: S&P 500 指数走高，交易员等待美联储议长的利率提示
item.description: 周二，美国股市悄然走高，创下自五月以来的最佳连胜纪录。政府停摆已进入第七天，投资者的目光已不再关注政府停摆，与人工智能相关的公告继续推动科技股走高。【原文：US stocks crept higher on Tuesday to trade at record levels following their best winning streak since May. Investors are looking past the government shutdown, which is entering a seventh day, as announcements tied to artificial intelligence continued to propel technology shares higher.】

item.title: 乌克兰在袭击浪潮后寻求将天然气进口量提高 30
item.description: 乌克兰表示，在俄罗斯加强对关键能源基础设施的攻击后，乌克兰将不得不增加近三分之一的天然气进口。【原文：Ukraine said it will have to ramp up natural gas imports by almost a third after Russia intensified attacks against key energy infrastructure.】

item.title: 在司法部调查中被点名的交易商加利亚尔迪如果被排除在外将受到 "侮辱
item.description: 一名交易员因 600 万美元的未付奖金与其前雇主发生争执，他说，如果美国大宗交易调查传票中没有他的名字，他将会受到 "侮辱"。【原文：A trader embroiled in a dispute with his former employer over $6 million in unpaid bonuses said he’d have been “insulted” if he wasn’t named in a subpoena related to a US block trading probe.】

item.title: 肯尼亚连续第八次降低利率，通胀保持稳定
item.description: 肯尼亚中央银行连续第八次下调基准利率，通胀率保持在目标范围内，以帮助刺激私营部门获得更便宜的信贷，促进经济增长。【原文：Kenya’s central bank cut its benchmark interest rate for an eighth straight time with inflation remaining within the targeted band, to help spur cheaper credit to the private sector and boost economic growth.】

item.title: 康涅狄格州州长担心纽约市失去财政优势
item.description: 康涅狄格州州长内德-拉蒙特（Ned Lamont）说，他 "有点 "担心，如果民主党人佐赫兰-马姆达尼（Zohran Mamdani）赢得纽约市市长竞选并实施他的议程，会对康涅狄格州产生什么潜在影响。【原文：Connecticut Governor Ned Lamont said he’s a “little bit” worried about the potential impact on his state should fellow Democrat Zohran Mamdani win the mayor’s race in New York City and follow through on his agenda.】

item.title: CVC与私人信贷基金洽谈WebPros债务再融资事宜
item.description: 据知情人士透露，CVC Capital Partners 正在与私人信贷机构谈判，为瑞士软件企业 WebPros 的股息资本结构调整提供资金。【原文：CVC Capital Partners is in talks with private credit lenders to finance a dividend recapitalization of Swiss software business WebPros, according to people with knowledge of the matter.】

item.title: Ares 的 deVeer 说，数据中心的繁荣带来了过度建设的风险
item.description: Ares Management Corp. 联席总裁基普-德维尔（Kipp deVeer）表示，随着全球最大的投资者希望在人工智能热潮中套现，大量资本涌入人工智能基础设施，正在引发产能过剩的风险。联席总裁基普-德维尔（Kipp deVeer）表示。【原文：The flood of capital pouring into AI infrastructure is raising the risks of overcapacity as the world’s biggest investors look to cash in on the artificial intelligence boom, according to Ares Management Corp. Co-President Kipp deVeer.】

item.title: 匈牙利中央银行在福林下跌后推迟降息计划
item.description: 在维克多-欧尔班总理的政府推动降低利率导致福林汇率下挫之后，匈牙利央行申明其倾向于紧缩银根和稳定货币。【原文：Hungary’s central bank affirmed its preference for tight monetary conditions and a stable currency after a push by Prime Minister Viktor Orban’s government to lower interest rates sank the forint.】

item.title: Kering 创 15 个月新高，成为摩根士丹利最青睐的奢侈品品牌
item.description: 在摩根士丹利（Morgan Stanley）分析师将古驰（Gucci）的所有者开云集团（Kering SA）列为欧洲奢侈品股票的首选之后，开云集团的股价飙升至近 15 个月以来的最高水平。【原文：Kering SA shares soared to the highest level in almost 15 months after Morgan Stanley analysts crowned the Gucci owner as their top pick among European luxury stocks.】

item.title: 世贸组织认为特朗普关税将在 2026 年全面影响贸易增长
item.description: 世界贸易组织表示，全球货物贸易在经历了2025年上半年出人意料的恢复性增长后，预计明年将大幅放缓，这反映了美国总统唐纳德-特朗普的关税政策对国际商业的延迟拖累。【原文：The growth of global goods trade is expected to slow sharply next year after a surprisingly resilient first half of 2025, reflecting a delayed drag on international commerce from US President Donald Trump’s tariffs, the World Trade Organization said.】

item.title: 卢拉的自由运输计划引发财政担忧，导致雷亚尔贬值
item.description: 巴西财政部长费尔南多-哈达德（Fernando Haddad）周二表示，巴西政府正在研究在全国范围内提供免费公共交通服务的可行性。【原文：Brazil’s government is studying the feasibility of offering free public transportation nationwide, Finance Minister Fernando Haddad said on Tuesday, stoking fiscal concerns that sent the real tumbling.】

item.title: Eskom 最大工会在工资谈判前要求加薪 15
item.description: 南非 Eskom 控股 SOC 有限公司最大的工会要求在即将开始的谈判之前将工资提高 15%。【原文：The biggest union at South Africa’s Eskom Holdings SOC Ltd. is demanding a wage increase of as much as 15% ahead of negotiations that are set to begin.】

item.title: 爱尔兰预计 2026 年预算盈余将减少一半
item.description: 爱尔兰预计其预算盈余将在 2026 年减少一半，这对政府来说是一个不受欢迎的前景，因为它正试图抵御可能对美国跨国公司主导的经济产生巨大影响的全球贸易冲击。【原文：Ireland expects its budget surplus to drop by half in 2026, an unwelcome outlook for the government as it tries to fend off global trade shocks that could have an outsized impact on the US multinational-dominated economy.】

item.title: 黄金出口减少使加拿大成为第二大贸易逆差国
item.description: 黄金出口的下降和避险金属进口的激增促使加拿大出现了有史以来第二大贸易赤字，仅次于 4 月份达到的最低点。【原文：Falling gold exports and surging imports of the safe-haven metal pushed Canada to post its second-largest trade deficit on record, surpassed only by the nadir it reached in April.】

item.title: 人工智能需求蓬勃发展，戴尔上调未来四年业绩预期
item.description: 戴尔科技公司将未来两年的销售额和利润增长预期提高了一倍左右，并表示对人工智能产品的需求将使这些更高的预期至少延续到 2030 财年。【原文：Dell Technologies Inc. roughly doubled its growth estimates for sales and profit for the next two years, and said demand for artificial intelligence products will extend those higher projections at least through the 2030 fiscal year.】

item.title: BGN 聘请 Trafigura 前锂业主管建立金属交易部门
item.description: BGN 集团周二发布新闻稿称，该公司已聘请前 Trafigura 集团高管克莱尔-布兰切兰德（Claire Blanchelande）担任其全球金属业务主管，这标志着这家能源公司向金属行业的最新进军。【原文：BGN Group has hired former Trafigura Group executive Claire Blanchelande as its global head of metals, the company said in a press release on Tuesday, marking the energy firm’s latest push into the sector.】

item.title: 英国安全官员将就撤销的中国案件接受质询
item.description: 在英国寻求与中国重建经济关系的同时，由其首席检察官提起的中国间谍案却以失败告终。【原文：Top UK security officials will face questions over an aborted China spying case brought by its chief prosecutor, which collapsed at the same time that it is seeking to rebuild economic ties with the country.】

item.title: 马萨诸塞州抵消特朗普科研削减的努力陷入僵局
item.description: 马萨诸塞州州长莫拉-希利（Maura Healey）努力用州政府的资金来应对特朗普政府削减科研经费的政策，商界领袖、投资者和学术界人士为此欢呼雀跃；以至于最近一次关于这一举措的会议需要挤满座位。【原文：Business leaders, investors and academics have cheered Massachusetts Governor Maura Healey’s efforts to counter the Trump administration’s research funding cuts with state money — so much so that a recent meeting on the initiative required overflow seating.】

item.title: 比特币人寿保险提供商 Meanwhile 融资 8200 万美元
item.description: 阿波罗（Apollo）、西北互助保险公司（Northwestern Mutual）、黑豹资本（Pantera Capital）和Stillmark公司与贝恩资本（Bain Capital）和加密货币投资者豪恩风险投资公司（Haun Ventures）一起，在一轮8200万美元的融资中支持比特币人寿保险公司Meanwhile。【原文：Apollo, Northwestern Mutual, Pantera Capital and Stillmark are joining Bain Capital and crypto investor Haun Ventures to back the Bitcoin life insurance firm Meanwhile in a $82 million funding round.】

item.title: 金融科技公司 Ramp 推出反欺诈和账单支付人工智能代理
item.description: 支出管理平台 Ramp Inc. 正在利用人工智能代理来帮助消除企业客户面临的一个日益严重的问题：发票欺诈。【原文：Spend management platform Ramp Inc. is enlisting artificial intelligence agents to help eliminate a growing problem for corporate customers: invoice fraud.】

item.title: 降雨预报缓解巴西作物忧虑，阿拉比卡咖啡下跌
item.description: 阿拉比卡咖啡在纽约连续第二天下跌，原因是巴西的降雨预报缓解了人们对近期干旱天气影响巴西下一季作物产量的担忧。【原文：Arabica coffee declined for a second day in New York, as rain forecast in Brazil eased concerns about the impact of recent dry weather on the top grower’s crop for next season.】

item.title: 高盛交易员称投资者不应对抗人工智能交易
item.description: "不要与美联储作对 "一直是一条万无一失的投资法则。高盛集团（Goldman Sachs Group Inc）宏观交易员鲍比-莫拉维（Bobby Molavi）认为，强大的人工智能股票交易似乎也是如此。【原文：A surefire investing rule has always been “don’t fight the Fed.” The same seems true of the powerful artificial intelligence trade in stocks, according to Goldman Sachs Group Inc. macro trader Bobby Molavi.】

item.title: IBM 与 Anthropic 合作开发人工智能辅助软件编码，业绩大增
item.description: 国际商业机器公司（International Business Machines Corp.）宣布计划将 Anthropic 的人工智能技术整合到其软件解决方案中，该公司股价在周二的盘前交易中大涨。【原文：International Business Machines Corp. shares jumped in premarket trading on Tuesday after the company announced a plan to integrate Anthropic’s artificial intelligence technologies into its software solutions.】

item.title: 燃气轮机紧缩威胁亚洲需求红利
item.description:
某些型号的等待时间现在一直持续到本世纪末，这给该地区的液化天然气运输商带来了麻烦。【原文：

Wait-times for some models now stretch all the way to the end of the decade, spelling trouble for LNG shippers to the region.

】

item.title: 美国锂业股份激增 175%，美洲锂业分析师却感到不满
item.description: 对市场来说，这几乎已经是老生常谈了。让一家陷入困境的公司与美国政府达成协议，并获得唐纳德-特朗普总统的批准，然后坐等股价起飞。【原文：It’s almost old hat to the market by now. Take a struggling company, cut a deal with the US government, sealed with the approval of President Donald Trump, sit back and watch the stock take off.】

item.title: 欧盟希望制裁俄罗斯影子石油舰队使用的假国旗
item.description: 根据彭博社看到的文件，欧盟已提议对为俄罗斯影子船队中受制裁油轮提供假国旗的三家公司实施限制。【原文：The European Union has proposed restrictions on three firms that have provided fake flags to sanctioned oil tankers in Russia’s shadow fleet, according to documents seen by Bloomberg.】

item.title: 基础设施建设热潮推动宏利筹集 55 亿美元资金
item.description: 投资者对数字基础设施、能源和交通资产的需求不断增加，推动了宏利投资管理公司（Manulife Investment Management）的筹资，该公司完成了其有史以来规模最大的 55 亿美元基础设施基金的募集。【原文：Rising investor appetite for digital infrastructure, energy and transportation assets boosted fundraising for Manulife Investment Management, which closed its largest-ever infrastructure fund with $5.5 billion.】

item.title: 据说 MMC 港口将推迟马来西亚自 2012 年以来最大规模的首次公开募股
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，MMC Port Holdings Sdn.正在将首次公开募股计划推迟到明年，因为该公司希望将全年业绩纳入其中，以提高估值。【原文：MMC Port Holdings Sdn. is postponing its planned initial public offering to next year as it seeks to include its full-year results to bolster valuation, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 奥鲁比斯将面向欧洲客户的 2026 年铜报价提高近 40
item.description: 据一位熟悉内情的人士透露，欧洲最大的铜生产商奥鲁比斯公司（Aurubis AG）计划明年将其向地区客户交付金属的溢价提高近 40%。【原文：Aurubis AG, Europe’s largest copper producer, plans to raise the premium it charges to deliver metal to regional customers by nearly 40% next year, according to a person familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 随着区块链支付的普及，纽约银行探索代币化存款
item.description: 纽约银行梅隆公司（Bank of New York Mellon Corp.【原文：Bank of New York Mellon Corp. is exploring tokenized deposits to enable clients to make payments using blockchain, as major banks across the world step up use of the technology underpinning digital assets to transfer funds.】
